fields.headline: For the record
fields.bodyText: An untitled Siegfried Sassoon poem was published in part in Max Egremont’s Siegfried Sassoon: A Life. It had not been published in full until we did so last week (“Uncovered a century on, the lost love poem of Siegfried Sassoon”, 9 June, News, page 3). A sub-heading referred to an “Afghani refugee”. As the style guide says, a person is Afghan and the country’s currency is afghani (“Teenager gives first account of perilous journey to UK haven”, 9 June, News, page 12). Write to the Readers’ Editor, the Observer, York Way, London N1 9GU, email observer.readers@observer.co.uk, tel 020 3353 4736
